Uses of Interface
uk.ac.tees.bronze.L1087591.MalfunctionHandler

  • Packages that use MalfunctionHandler 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.tees.bronze.L1087591
    This package contains the solution to the BRONZE task for AJP-P4 which uses the Chain of responsibility design pattern with interface.

    • Uses of MalfunctionHandler in uk.ac.tees.bronze.L1087591

      Classes in uk.ac.tees.bronze.L1087591 that implement MalfunctionHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Captain
      Captain represent the last item from the chain of responsibility.
      class  Engineer
      Engineer represent the third chain of the pattern
      class  ServiceRobot
      ServiceRobot is the second chain of the responsibility.
      class  SpaceMonkey

      void MalfunctionHandler.setNextHandler(MalfunctionHandler handler)
      setNextHandler sets the problem to the next appropriate handler.
